Gamdias AEOLUS M3-1201 120mm ARGB Casing Cooling Fan

The Gamdias AEOLUS M3-1201 ARGB Casing Cooling Fan focuses on appearance and performance to give the optimal cooling solution for your setup. Featuring stealth black tuned fan blades for maximum performance, a redesigned hydraulic bearing with clever PWM function, and low profile ARGB lighting for the ultimate in aesthetics.

Superior Airflow Performance

The AEOLUS M3 fans, designed with performance in mind, can run at speeds ranging from 800-2000 RPM for incredibly high air pressure. The fan airflow capacity may ramp up to 69.01 CFM with optimized design and PWM for optimal cooling and silent operation.

Refined Fan Design

The Gamdias AEOLUS M3-1201 ARGB Casing Cooling Fan frame has a chamfered design for a more robust air intake, and the modified fan blade design provides maximum airflow performance, improved acoustics, and a minimalist aesthetic.

Premium Hydraulic Bearing

The Gamdias AEOLUS M3-1201 ARGB Casing Cooling Fan With near-zero friction between moving parts, the AEOLUS M3 fans make minimal noise while generating maximum airflow while having a long lifespan.

Customizable and Adaptive

The Gamdias AEOLUS M3-1201 ARGB Casing Cooling Fan supports addressable RGB sync through the motherboard manufacturer's sync software and features 30 built-in lighting effects that can be accessed using the provided remote or the PC case button.

Low-Profile Concentric Lighting

Fully addressable RGB lighting rings are incorporated into the AEOLUS M3 fan frame for a more low-profile take on RGB, offering a subtle but modish aesthetic without sacrificing the brilliant colors of the ARGB lighting.

full_description:
Gamdias AEOLUS M2 1203 Lite 120mm RGB PC Case & Radiator Fan (3 Fans Pack)

The new AEOLUS M2 1203 LITE comes with Trio Ring RGB Fans that contain up to 30 choices of chromatic lighting effects (Including Rainbow, Multi-Color, LED Off, and More) available for a Lighting Switch Cable Addressable RGB LED Customizations 1 2 to PC Case Button swap, allowing simple and efficient one-tap effect adjustments that light battle-station up. It retains to its unique motherboard sync functionality which is compatible with Addressable RGB Header (ASUS Aura Sync), JRAINBOW Header (MSI Mystic Light Sync), Addressable RGB LED Header (ASRock Polychrome Sync / Biostar RGB Sync), and Digital Pin Header (GIGABYTE RGB Fusion 2.0) is capable of synchronizing itself with any Motherboard that comes with a 5V 3-Pin addressable RGB header and Initiating a system-wide Motherboard Sync. The new AEOLUS M2-1203 LITE significantly reduces the clamour produced through the process of fan rotation, while generating hyper-efficient airflow. The divine keeper of the winds provides a quiet, adequate, and an icy-cool gaming environment that one could enjoy. This AEOLUS M2-1203 LITE also offering a greater flexibility to connect additional RGB components to your rig via a 5V 3-pin 'Male and Female Connector' designed specifically for the RGB Motherboard Sync functionality. This new AEOLUS M2-1203 LITE has 02 year warranty.
